name: KonoSuba
description:
Add a ❤️ to receive future updates.

At least I tried :)

You can use the hints from the pictures :)

p.s. this is not a version update, this is a set of characters in the future it will be replenished

Order a private LoRa for any character (for a fee) we will agree on the price - Discord. Or you can just support me here - PUSH. :)
tags: kono subarashii sekai ni shukufuku wo! movie: kurenai densetsu
